nodes.text: The Zoraster system was a star system located within the Outer Rim Territories' Zoraster sector. It contained the planet Zoraster, the homeworld of the Human male Condi. At some point by 28 BBY, the slaver Krayn captured Condi, taking him off-world and forcing him to work aboard his starship.
The Zoraster system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square U-13.
